title: Black Widow
description: Black Widow is a 2021 American superhero film based on Marvel Comics featuring the character Natasha Romanoff / Black Widow.

title: Shang Chi
description: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings is a 2021 American superhero film based on Marvel Comics featuring the character Shang-Chi.

title: Loki
description: Loki is an American television series created by Michael Waldron for the streaming service Disney+.

title: How I Met Your Mother
description: How I Met Your Mother is an American sitcom created by Carter Bays and Craig Thomas for CBS.

title: Money Heist
description: Money Heist is a Spanish television series created by Álex Pina. The series traces two long-prepared heists led by the Professor (Álvaro Morte), one on the Royal Mint of Spain, and one on the Bank of Spain.
